entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers overnight. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 7. POP 70%
